section.section: On the recommendation of the President, and in accordance with the requirements of Title 3 of the State Personnel and Pensions Article, the Board of Trustees of St. Mary's College of Maryland shall establish a personnel system.

text.section:
The personnel system shall provide fair and equitable procedures for:
The redress of employee grievances; and
The hiring, promotion, and termination of employees in accordance with law.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, an employee of the College qualifies for and shall participate in the Employees' Pension System of the State of Maryland or the Teachers' Pension System of the State of Maryland.
An employee in a position determined by the Board to be a professional or faculty position may join the optional retirement program under Title 30 of the State Personnel and Pensions Article.
